name: Destined to Win (D2W)
description: Our parent network — empowering leaders and churches for kingdom growth.

name: Ethiopian Church in Reading
description: Ethiopian fellowship meeting at The Well Church, Dawlish Road. Worship every Saturday 3pm–6pm, prayer every Friday 6pm–8pm.

name: Kharis Church Reading
description: A revival-seeking, dynamic and lively church in the heart of Reading.

name: Wellspring Ministry
description: A Bible-believing church based at Dawlish Road, dedicated to the teaching of God's Word, prayer, worship and spiritual growth.

name: Torch Reading
description: A helping hand from local churches — free practical, personal and emotional support for individuals and families in need across Reading.

name: ReadiFood
description: Emergency food bank delivering 150–180 food parcels every week to families and individuals in Reading.

name: Transform Reading
description: A network of churches and Christian organisations working together to transform our town through prayer, unity and service.

name: Green Health Thames Valley
description: Free therapeutic horticulture sessions for wellbeing, serving the community since 2014.
